# AES Everywhere - Cross Language Encryption Library

Cipher: AES/256/CBC/PKCS5Padding with random generated salt

## Perl version

### Installation

https://metacpan.org/pod/Crypt::Rijndael

This module depends on `Crypt::CBC` module  
you can download it here [Crypt::CBC](https://metacpan.org/pod/Crypt::CBC) and install it manually  

```sh
wget https://cpan.metacpan.org/authors/id/L/LE/LEONT/Crypt-Rijndael-1.13.tar.gz
tar -xzvf Crypt-Rijndael-1.13.tar.gz
cd Crypt-Rijndael-1.13
perl Makefile.PL
make
sudo make install

wget https://cpan.metacpan.org/authors/id/L/LD/LDS/Crypt-CBC-2.33.tar.gz
tar -xzvf Crypt-CBC-2.33.tar.gz
cd Crypt-CBC-2.33
perl Makefile.PL
make
sudo make install

```

if you use Ubuntu you can install `libcrypt-cbc-perl` package

```sh
sudo apt-get install libcrypt-cbc-perl
```

or via [perl CPAN package manager](http://www.cpan.org/modules/INSTALL.html)

```
cpanm Crypt::CBC
```

or via [ppm manager](http://code.activestate.com/ppm/) with Active Perl
```sh
ppm install Crypt-CBC
```
